item.description:
Part 3 of our Fall Speaker Series:

Ditching Your Boss? Practical Steps to Starting Your Own Business

Cost: FREE

Location: Western New England College

Speakers: Freda Brown, Susan Kelley

There’s more to running a business than being good at your craft. These women will give you tips on how to create good record-keeping systems and will give you savvy tax planning advice to assure that your efforts keep you in the black. They’ll share success stories and pitfalls associated with these elements, and then go over what is essential to build a strong business to get you where you want to go.
item.how_to_find_us: The series will be held in the School of Business. Once in the building the gaurd will direct you to the correct room.
item.name: Fall Speaker Series- Setting Yourself up for Success
